General.Name: Semacom Integrated Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Semacom Integrated Tbk manufactures and sells electrical panels in Indonesia. The company also offers power distribution systems; and assembles and sells EV charging machines, as well as assembles electric batteries. In addition, it engages in renewable energy business. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Intan I RT 001/001, Bogor, Indonesia, 16340
